alert.note: Alert for Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 2:11PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PASCO...PINELLAS AND NORTHWESTERN HILLSBOROUGH COUNTIES THROUGH 300 PM EDT... At 210 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Holiday to near Palm Harbor to near Harbor Bluffs. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Clearwater, Largo, Pinellas Park, Temple Terrace, Seminole, New Port Richey, Zephyrhills, Dade City, Hudson, Lutz, Holiday, St. Petersburg, St. Leo, Palm Harbor, South Highpoint, New Port Richey East, Palm River-Clair Mel, Tampa International Airport, and East Lake-Orient Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Pinellas
